About Me

Hi, my name’s Soma and I’m a senior Data Engineer. Highly experienced data professional with 20+ years in data engineering and database administration. Proven ability to design and implement scalable data solutions, lead cross-functional teams, and drive data-informed decision-making. AWS Certified with expertise in different Database technologies - Open source Databases[RDBMS/Distributed Databases/NoSQL/Vector Databases], Data Engineering technologies [ETL, Analytics and Modern Data engineering Stack] and Python. I have worked at a number of companies gaining teamwork and leadership skills.

I am passionate about : Cloud technologies [AWS/GCP], System Design, Gen AI and ML/MLOPS
